item.title: Resume
item.description:
I am Gianluca Camarca, a videogame programmer currently based in Italy. I am specialized in gameplay programming and technical game design. I started my career as a professional in the games industry in 2020, and I have been passionate about creating engaging gameplay experiences since then.

Download Resume as PDF | Linkedin | Github | Email

WORK HISTORY

Gameplay Programmer

September 2020 - Current
Company Name

Project Name (genre):

  • Implemented core gameplay mechanics and player movement systems.
  • Developed and maintained gameplay systems using [Engine/Language].
  • Collaborated with designers to prototype and iterate on game features.
  • Optimized code for performance across different platforms.
  • Wrote technical documentation for gameplay systems.

Previous Role

Month Year - Month Year
Previous Company

item.title: Project Title

Overview

Example: A third-person action-adventure game set in a sci-fi world. The game features advanced combat mechanics, parkour movement, and AI-driven enemies.

My Role

Your specific contributions to the project:

  • Implemented core gameplay mechanics
  • Developed AI systems
  • Created animation systems
  • Optimized performance

Technologies

List of technologies, engines, and tools used:

  • Engine: Unreal Engine 5 / Unity
  • Language: C++ / C#
  • Tools: Git, Perforce, Visual Studio

Key Features
